info.name: Fashion Ecommerce API
info.description: Complete API collection for Fashion Ecommerce Backend with JWT Authentication

request.description: Get home page data including categories, banners, popular products, and recommended products. Language is taken from X-Language header (en or ar). Optional authentication for personalized recommendations.
